title: Railworks TS2014 RailTraction NS 1800
description:
The Class 1600 was ordered in 1978, after several types of locomotives were tested in the 1970s. One of those was the French Class BB 7200, on which the 1600 is based. The 58 locomotives were delivered between 1981 and 1983. As a result of their delivery, the old Class 1000 and Class 1500 were taken out of service.

Thanks to the electronic power control, these locomotives were the most economical but also the most powerful locomotives that Dutch Railways had.

The Class 1700 are similar but not entirely equal to the Class 1600/1800. The newer 1700 series have updated and extended electronics, a newer safety system (ATB phase 4 vs ATB phase 3 in the 1600 series) and a different braking system. The locomotives are fitted with monomotor bogies.

Includes

This package contains:

Electric locomotive Class NS 1800.

Realistic sounds. Optimized for EFX / Openall.

Authentic cab.

Advanced pantograph controls

Dodeman / Sifa safety system

Cruisecontrol with ATB speed detectionv (more information in manual).

Fast brake release.

4 speed wiper motion including interval function.

22 city logos from cities located in the Netherlands with corresponding locomotive number.

2 tone horn.

Dynamic lights in the cab.

Autonumbering.

Advanced ATB-EG safety systems 

Advanced ATB-VV safety systems 

ATB speed monitoring including overspeed brake penalty.

Normal and advanced driving modus.

Photo textured details.

TS2012 features (raindrops on the windows and visible frontlights).

TS2013 Optimized.

Quick drive.

Realistic traction performence.

Realistic brake performence.
